name: PaginatedDataTable
desc: A table that follows the [Material 2](https://material.io/go/design-data-tables) design specification, using multiple pages to display data.

fields.name: header
fields.desc: The table card's optional header.

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: Icon buttons to show at the top end side of the table. The [header] must not be null to show the actions.

fields.name: columns
fields.desc: The configuration and labels for the columns in the table.

fields.name: sortColumnIndex
fields.desc: The current primary sort key's column.

fields.name: sortAscending
fields.desc: Whether the column mentioned in [sortColumnIndex], if any, is sorted in ascending order.

fields.name: onSelectAll
fields.desc: Invoked when the user selects or unselects every row, using the checkbox in the heading row.

fields.name: dataRowMinHeight
fields.desc: The minimum height of each row (excluding the row that contains column headings).

fields.name: dataRowMaxHeight
fields.desc: The maximum height of each row (excluding the row that contains column headings).

fields.name: headingRowHeight
fields.desc: The height of the heading row.

fields.name: horizontalMargin
fields.desc: The horizontal margin between the edges of the table and the content in the first and last cells of each row.

fields.name: columnSpacing
fields.desc: The horizontal margin between the contents of each data column.

fields.name: showCheckboxColumn
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dataTable.showCheckboxColumn}

fields.name: showFirstLastButtons
fields.desc: Flag to display the pagination buttons to go to the first and last pages.

fields.name: initialFirstRowIndex
fields.desc: The index of the first row to display when the widget is first created.

fields.name: dividerThickness
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dataTable.dividerThickness}

fields.name: onPageChanged
fields.desc: Invoked when the user switches to another page.

fields.name: rowsPerPage
fields.desc: The number of rows to show on each page.

fields.name: availableRowsPerPage
fields.desc: The options to offer for the rowsPerPage.

fields.name: onRowsPerPageChanged
fields.desc: Invoked when the user selects a different number of rows per page.

fields.name: source
fields.desc: The data source which provides data to show in each row.

fields.name: dragStartBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.scrollable.dragStartBehavior}

fields.name: checkboxHorizontalMargin
fields.desc: Horizontal margin around the checkbox, if it is displayed.

fields.name: arrowHeadColor
fields.desc: Defines the color of the arrow heads in the footer.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.scroll_view.controller}

fields.name: primary
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.scroll_view.primary}

fields.name: headingRowColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dataTable.headingRowColor}

fields.name: showEmptyRows
fields.desc: Controls the visibility of empty rows on the last page of a [PaginatedDataTable].
